metadata.title: CVE-2024-41019 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Validate ff offsetThis adds sanity checks for ff offset. There is a checkon rt->first_free at first, but walking through by ffwithout any check. If the second ff is a large offset.We may encounter an out-of-bound read.
